document_data.name: Samite
document_data.mainbody: '''Samite''' was a type of luxury fabric found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: This type of fabric was thick and woven from high-quality threads of [[silk]] and golden thread.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], samite was among the many fabrics that [[Hlethvagi Anteos]] kept within crates in their storeroom on the [[Dungeon Level]] of [[Undermountain]].<ref>
document_data.Usage: Samite was used to weave a wide variety of products. These included caps, [[robe]]s, rugs, [[sash]]es, and [[surcoat]]s.

Notable Users.General: * This fabric was considered such a luxury item that some nations outlawed the wearing of samite clothing by all but members of high society.
Notable Users.Creatures: * [[Camel of the Pearl|Camels of the Pearl]] were often outfitted with riding tack, such as [[bridle]]s and [[saddle]]s, that were made with samite.<ref>
Notable Users.Individuals: * The [[sha'ir]] [[Akim al-Kalaas]] typically wore either dark green or maroon [[robe]]s that were made of samite and [[silk]].
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements:
* In the [[City of Brass]], the [[Palazzo of the Blue Horse]] had brocade cushions in its dining hall that were made of samite.
* In the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], samite was among the many fabrics that one could be found used in [[Waterdeep]] for fine fabrics.
